sentences.sContent: The candlestick was in the form of an angel holding a nosegay, in the centre of which the wax taper was to be placed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The candlestick was in the form of an angel holding a nosegay, in the centre of which the wax taper was to be placed.
sentences.sCn: 它的形状是一个抱着花束的安琪儿；而蜡烛就插在这个花束的中央。 这烛台在一张绿色的写字台上佔了一个地位。

sentences.sContent: Easter is also a festival that we could send flowers corsages and so on. Many persons go to churches dedicate up the nosegay .
sentences.sContent_eng: Easter is also a festival that we could send flowers corsages and so on. Many persons go to churches dedicate up the nosegay .
sentences.sCn: 复活节也是向你所关怀的人关鲜花，盆景，胸花等地节日。许多去做礼拜的人这天也向教堂献上花束。
